title: Jim Caviezel talks Person of Interest and getting punched in the nose with Brad Blanks
author: bradblanks
comment: Jim is such a cutie! Watched this video five times already!
to ja już K.....wa nie mogę się doczekać mojej operacji nosa😀😇😀😠😮😮haha😎😎😎👃👃👃👣👣👣👣
description:
Person of Interest star Jim Caviezel tells Brad Blanks about his first movie role in Australia where he got punched in the nose. He also discusses his character Reese in the show Person of Interest on CBS. www.bradblanks.com TWITTER: @bradblanks
